column1: Smoque BBQ////They also have pretty tasty sides. I'll start with their 'slaw. If you order a plate or sandwich
column2: the 'slaw comes with it. Personally I think creamy 'slaws are disgusting
column3: and until I went to Smoque I thought "creamy" was the only type of 'slaw out there. Smoque's 'slaw is vinegar based and is pretty damn amazing. Whenever I go
column4: I get a large container to go
column5: to have as a side with my lunches. Their beans
column6: mac n'cheese and fries are all must tries as well. I'm not a fan off their cornbread
column7: but I know some that are; and from what I hear their peach cobbler is pretty damn tasty as well. I've never had it
column8: because by the time "dessert" enters my mind
